metadata.title: CVE-2017-13066 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 has a memory leak vulnerability in the function CloneImage in magick/image.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2017-13066` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.28-2
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.28-2
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.28-2
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.28-2
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.28-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.28-2').
